column4: anyone help with mounting an external drive NTFS partitoned? http://pastebin.com/m1686220d

those are ntfs partitions

http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=12306
why use one over the other
you will find there are many diff ways to accomplish the same thing
just sudo apt-get install ntfs-config
